chat_history.message:
Hello, I have an issue with my iPhone 12 mini. Thank you for the help,

When the seller receives the package, they will have 3 working days (5 working days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 working days to process a refund if eligible.

The customer must meet the following requirements for a successful return:
✔ Confirm that the product has not been opened by third parties, nor damaged or exposed to liquids.
✔ Has confirmed having possession of the return label.
✔ Accepts including accessories and proof of purchase within the package to process the return.
✔ Is aware of having 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: once the package is delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for computers and appliances) to repair or replace the article and 2 days to process a refund if they have a right to.

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully canceled and the customer has been refunded. Please close the case.

Regards,
JY
